item.title: EGM
item.description: Nominations for the remaining roles on the committee are now open, so be sure to nominate yourself if interested! On Tuesday the 13th of July at 7pm on our Discord we have an Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) to fill out the roles on our committee. Make sure you come along to vote, and apply for a role if you are interested in contributing! If you want to run for committee yourself, please apply at https://hacksoc.

item.title: EGM on the 13th of July!
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} EGM on the 13th of July! Nominations for the remaining roles on the committee are now open, so be sure to nominate yourself if interested! EGM - Fill out your Next Committee! On Tuesday the 13th of July at 7pm on our Discord we have an Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) to fill out the roles on our committee.

item.title: AGM & Lightning Talks
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} AGM & Lightning Talks Coming up we have some lightning talks from our members, and our AGM is soon, on the 10th of May. Nominations for next year's committee are now open! Upcoming Events Our events run at 7pm and run on our Discord or via Zoom. For events running on Zoom you can join with the button below.

item.title: Computerphile, Hello World!
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Computerphile, Hello World! Coming up tonight we have our last event of the term, a talk on the Computerphile YouTube channel from the people behind it. Upcoming Events Our events run at 7pm and run on our Discord or via Zoom. For events running on Zoom you can join with the button below. Join on Zoom Computerphile, Hello World!

item.title: Discord Bot workshop, 3D printed bionics, and Computerphile talk!
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Discord Bot workshop, 3D printed bionics, and Computerphile talk! Coming up we have a workshop on making modular discord bots in python, a talk on 3D printing prosthetics, and a talk on the Computerphile YouTube channel. Upcoming Events Our events run at 7pm and run on our Discord or via Zoom. For events running on Zoom you can join with the button below.

item.title: Packaging for Linux, Diversity Talk, & More!
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Packaging for Linux, Diversity Talk, & More! Coming up we have a workshop on packaging Linux applications, and talks on Diversity in Tech and 3D printing prosthetics. Upcoming Events Our events run at 7pm and run on our Discord or via Zoom. For events running on Zoom you can join with the button below. Join on Zoom Packaging your application for Linux Workshop Tomorrow, on the 23rd of February at 7pm on Discord we have a workshop on packaging applications for distribution on Linux.

item.title: Welcome Back: Plain Text Talk & More
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Welcome Back: Plain Text Talk & More Coming up we have a talk on the hidden story of text, and soon we have talks on JavaScript Game Development and Diversity in the Tech Industry. We hope you have had a good new year, and have survived your exams. Over the next term we have some great things to offer you, starting with an exciting selection of speakers.

item.title: Automotive Cyber Security Talk and Final Fantasy Quirks
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Automotive Cyber Security Talk and Final Fantasy Quirks Coming up tonight we have a talk on Automotive Cyber Security, and to Thursday we have rescheduled our talk on the Quirks of the Final Fantasy games. Upcoming Events Our events run at 7pm and run on our Discord or via Zoom. For events running on Zoom you can join with the button below.

item.title: Advent of Code, Final Fantacy Quirks, and Automotive Cyber Security Talk
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Advent of Code, Final Fantacy Quirks, and Automotive Cyber Security Talk Thanks to everyone who attended HackNotts2020 over the weekend. Coming up in December we have a talk on the Quirks of the Final Fantasy games, and a talk on Automotive Cyber Security. Advent of Code In the run up to Christmas there is a series of programming challenged known as the Advent of Code.

item.title: Last Chance to get HackNotts Tickets!
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Last Chance to get HackNotts Tickets! HackNotts is only a day away, so if you haven't already be sure to get your ticket! HackNotts: Get your ticket NOW! It's your last chance to get tickets to HackNotts, our fantastic Hackathon! Tickets will remain available until the start of HackNotts on Saturday. Find out more, and get your completely FREE ticket at the button below.

item.title: HackNotts is NEXT WEEK!
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} HackNotts is NEXT WEEK! HackNotts is next week, so make sure you pick up your tickets! Coming up, on Tuesday we have drop in programming caf√©, and we have plenty of great speaker events coming up as well. HACKNOTTS NEXT WEEK!!! HackNotts is NEXT WEEK, and we on committee are busy getting everything ready for HackSoc's greatest event of the year!

item.title: HackNotts in TWO WEEKS, Linux Workshop, and IoT Talk.
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} HackNotts in TWO WEEKS, Linux Workshop, and IoT Talk. HackNotts is just two weeks away, so make sure you pick up your tickets! Coming up, on Tuesday we have a workshop on getting started with Linux, and we have plent of great speaker events coming up as well. HackNotts - TWO WEEKS AWAY!!! HackNotts is JUST TWO WEEKS AWAY now, and we on committee are busy getting everything ready for HackSoc's greatest event of the year!

item.title: Adding to Stack with .NET, Basic Game Development, and HackNotts soon!
item.description: HackSoc Newsletter a:hover {text-decoration:underline} .button:hover {background-color:#007d32;text-decoration:none} .button:active {box-shadow:none;position:relative;top:1px} Adding to Stack with .NET, Basic Game Development, and HackNotts soon! Tomorrow we have a talk on Adding to Slack with .NET. Next week we have a workshop on basic game dev in Monogame and HackNotts is getting very close, so make sure you pick up your tickets! HackNotts HackNotts is less than a month away now, and we on committee are busy getting everything ready for HackSoc's greatest event of the year!
